page.title: 10LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: NURSEYS IS AT 12 UPPER OLLAND STREET BUNGAY.IT WAS ESTABLISHED IN 1790.THEIR MAIN PRODUCTS ARE SHEEPSKIN COATS. NURSEYS EMPLOY 84 PEOPLE AND 200 OUTWORKERS.NURSEYS PRODUCTS ARE SOLD ALL OVER THE WORLD. CLAYS HAS 600 PEOPLE.ONE MACHINE CAN MAKE 1,400 BOOKS IN 1 MINUTE.CLAYS USED TO BE A SMALL FIRM,AND ALL PRINTING WAS DONE BY HAND. IN 1917 UTILUX BEGAN.ANOTHER 3 FACTORIES HAVE STARTED.THE OWNER IS MR JANSSEN,SON OF THE FIRST OWNER.UTILUX RECEIVES THEIR MATERIALS FROM GERMANY AND BIRMINGHAM.THEY MAKE ELECTRICAL APPLIANCES. {WATTS}:THEY STARTED THIS INDUSTRY IN 1900.THEY EMPLOY 18 MEN AND WOMEN.EACH TREE CAN MAKE 20-30 BATS.THEY MAKE 2,000 BATS PER WEEK.THE BATS MADE FROM WILLOW ARE SENT ALL OVER THE WORLD.
